body_html: This looks better now, I have a more general question - do we want philox generator as a string literal, or do we want it as a header that's redistributed with binaries and thus can be supplied to nvrtc as a header, not as part of a source file? Pros of going with the header is that when THC generation is moved to use philox too (to match jit) it can reuse this header, otherwise THC will either have to use curand or have a copy-paste of what's in this PR, both of those options are not great IMO.
